detail_desc: Long-sleeved jumper in soft, slub-knit cotton with a knitted motif on the front and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Small embroidered detail on the chest, and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.
Fitted, knee-length dress in lace with long sleeves and a seam at the waist. Half-lined.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with lacing and elastication at the waist. Fake fly with a button, front and back pockets and tapered legs.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Loose-knit bolero with 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and a ribbed edge around the opening. No fasteners.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Deep V-neck with lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in a linen and cotton weave with notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Patterned lining.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse woven in an airy cotton blend with broderie anglaise, a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short puff sleeves with elasticated frill trims, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Straight-style premium cotton jumper in a relaxed fit with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline cuffs and hem.
Jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Mesh lining.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trigger-clasp bracelets with different sorts of metal links.
T-shirt in printed jersey.

Soft, padded nursing bras in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with opening, jersey-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Decorative lace trims, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and straight-cut hem.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Calf-length skirt in supersoft, ribbed, brushed jersey with a high, elasticated waist and slits in the sides.

Double-breasted, straight-style coat in a felted wool blend with large notch lapels, handwarmer pockets, large flap patch pockets at the front and two inner pockets. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled and the polyester content is partly recycled.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Joggers in soft, slightly stretchy denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a double-layered skirt in glittery tulle. Round neckline, a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Short, sleeveless, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with one narrow and one wider shoulder strap. Jersey lining.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with zips in the sides. Low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Short, wide top in ribbed jersey with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a rounded lace collar and press-studs at the back of the neck. Long, puff sleeves with a narrow trim at the cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Top in soft viscose jersey with gathers in the sides for best fit and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Trousers in imitation leather with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with a decorative seam at the front and slit at the hems.
Running vest top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Skirt in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a smocked waist. Cotton lining.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a V-neck and dropped shoulders. Longer at the back.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Wide shoulder straps, a low cut at the back and a wide, ribbed hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in a soft cotton blend with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Whooli Chen x H&M. Boxer shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a print motif, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, pointelle cotton with a decorative lace trim around the neckline and armholes, and press-studs at the crotch.
Round shoulder bag in glittery imitation leather with embroidery and appliqués. Zip at the top and a shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size approx. 4x13 cm.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Tapered waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a lined hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Short-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow cuffs and ties, a yoke with concealed pleats at the back, and side pockets.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Scarf in a soft rib knit. Length 30 cm, circumference 60 cm.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined, glittery bikini top with removable inserts, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Long-sleeved, calf-length dress in a patterned weave with a decorative knot detail at one side and concealed zip at the back. Seam with a wide flounce at the hem and a slit at the front. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Waterproof hi-tops in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge, hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Slip-on trainers with fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Patterned swimsuit with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps.
Hat in felted fabric with a grosgrain band. Width of brim approx. 4 cm.

Short, double-breasted coat in a soft herringbone weave made from a wool blend with peak lapels, buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Lined in lightweight viscose twill with a sheen.
Pyjama top in soft fleece with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a loop at the back, canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Shorts in a patterned viscose weave with a high, smocked waist with a small frill trim at the top, and wrapover sides.
Fitted top in jersey with short sleeves.
Top in sequined mesh that is open at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a seam at the waist with a flared peplum. Lined.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit wool and cashmere blend with a turned-up hem.

Oxford cotton shirt in a straight, gently tapered fit with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and half-string back.
Fitted top in soft jersey with short sleeves.

Set with a hooded top and matching leggings in soft fabric. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a raw-edge hem. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and concealed button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
